allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add bean presets UI and fix SuggestionField binding

- Add preset management UI to BeanInfoPage \(drag to reorder, add/edit/delete\)
- Auto-save bean preset when leaving page or switching presets
- Fix SuggestionField breaking parent binding when user types
- Use onTextChanged handler to sync textInput from parent binding
- Rename "Bean Info" to "Beans" in UI

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
